HomePage.heroAbout: I’m a web developer and in this space I share experiences, learnings, and reflections on development and technology.
HomePage.aboutDescription: I’m a web developer and in this space I share experiences, learnings, and reflections on development and technology. Each post is based on real cases, well-thought-out ideas, and tools I actually use day to day.
HomePage.aboutDescription2: This blog is made for developers, tech enthusiasts, and anyone who enjoys understanding how the digital world works from the inside.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: You can reach me on any of my social networks or by sending an email directly :)
